notes.player:
After successful Deny The Witch: spend FP to prevent psychic power usage for 1d5 turns. If demon: +5 damage

After making a successful Deny the Witch attempt to stop a Power from affecting you, you may spend a Fate Point to prevent the enemy from using any powers at all for 1d5 turns. Furthermore, if the enemy is Daemonic in nature, they suffer 5 Damage.

requirement.value: 2 Advances in Discipline, Condemn the Witch Talent OR Emperor’s Aegis Talent
requirement.script: return this.actor.system.skills.discipline.advances >= 2 && (this.actor.itemTypes["talent"].find(i => i.name == "Condemn the Witch") || this.actor.itemTypes["talent"].find(i => i.name == "Emperor’s Aegis"))
